intro.title: GameCraft 2024
intro.subtitle: Ultimate Game Development Competition
intro.description: Join the ultimate game development competition and showcase your creativity with fellow developers from around the world.

offline.title: Offline Workshops
offline.description: Join our in-person workshops to learn game development techniques from industry experts.

online.title: Online Workshops
online.description: Access our comprehensive online workshop series from anywhere in the world.

aboutUs.title: About GameCraft
aboutUs.description: GameCraft is an annual game development competition that brings together creative minds to build innovative games. Our mission is to foster creativity, collaboration, and technical excellence in the gaming industry.

intro.title: GameCraft
intro.subtitle: The 4th Game Development Event at Amirkabir University of Technology
intro.description:
GameCraft is a game development event aimed at inspiring and nurturing passion in game design enthusiasts. Hosted by Amirkabir University of Technology, this year's event focuses on creating a platform for knowledge transfer and networking among game development experts.
The event includes in-person workshops, presentations, and a game development competition. Winners will be recognized and awarded at the closing ceremony.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description:
The Computer Science Student Association at Amirkabir University is an independent organization dedicated to scientific and educational activities. Each year, the association hosts numerous academic and educational events at university, national, and international levels, attracting a large audience. Notable events include ACM competitions, Linux festivals, DMC data mining competitions, and AAISS artificial intelligence seminars.
One of the association's key approaches is strengthening team spirit and large-scale collaboration, helping students gain valuable experience for their professional lives. This event is no exception, with many students actively participating in the association's initiatives.

howToParticipate.title: How to participate?
howToParticipate.content: To participate in GameCraft, you need to register through our website during the registration period. Teams can consist of 2-4 members. After registration, you'll receive access to workshops and resources. Make sure to attend all required workshops and follow the competition guidelines.

competitionRules.title: Competition Rules
competitionRules.content: Teams must develop an original game concept. The game should be developed using the technologies and frameworks covered in the workshops. All team members must contribute to the development process. The final submission must include the game executable, source code, and documentation.

judgingCriteria.title: Judging Criteria and Prizes
judgingCriteria.content: Games will be evaluated based on creativity, technical implementation, user experience, and innovation. The judging panel consists of industry experts and academic professionals. Prizes will be awarded to the top three teams, with additional recognition for special achievements in specific categories.

submissionDeadline.title: Submission Deadline
submissionDeadline.content: The final submission deadline is December 15th, 2024. Teams must submit their complete game package by this date. Late submissions will not be accepted. Make sure to test your game thoroughly before submission and include all required documentation.

home.title: GameCraft 2024 - Ultimate Game Development Competition
home.description: Join the ultimate game development competition and showcase your creativity with fellow developers from around the world.

staffs.title: Our Team - GameCraft 2024
staffs.description: Meet the dedicated team behind GameCraft 2024 - our organizing, technical, scientific, and creative teams working to make this competition amazing.
